DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to investigate, if new biomarkers may improve the early diagnostic of infections following major abdominal surgery and severe burn injuries.
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic of Infections Following Major Abdominal Surgery and Burn Injury
DOC.criteria: patients with major abdominal surgery (e.g. gastrectomy, hemi/colectomy, resection of sigma or rectum, resection of liver, esophagectomy) patients following severe burn injury (burn surface area >= 15%) age >= 18 years informed consent no informed consent emergency surgery immunocompromising diseases (e.g. HIV+, AIDS, Lymphoma or NonHodgkinLymphoma, AutoimmuneDiseases) preexisting liver or renal failure chronic therapy with corticoids
